title: [Grawood Farmstead, Town]
description: Square wooden planters filled to overflowing with pansies in a variety of colors stand beside a set of thick modwir steps leading to the general store.  A pair of rocking chairs sit on the store's porch, while garlands of greenery and flowers are draped from the edge of the roof.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
